Package polyglot.main

Contains classes to get and parse command line arguments and run the compilation process. All static globals should be found in this package.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Main
    Main is the main program of the extensible compiler.
    OptFlag<T>
    An OptFlag represents a command line option.
    OptFlag.Arg<T>
    An argument parsed from the command line.
    OptFlag.DoubleFlag
    A Flag that accepts a integer param.
    OptFlag.IntFlag
    A Flag that accepts a integer param.
    OptFlag.PathFlag<T>
    A OptFlag that accepts a string param with entries separated by the path separator.
    OptFlag.Switch
    A Flag that acts as a boolean switch.
    Options
    This object encapsulates various Polyglot options.
    Options.StdPathFlag
    A PathFlag that accepts a list of directory names and filters out the invalid ones.
    Report
    Class used for reporting debug messages.
    Version
    This class encapsulates the version of the compiler.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    OptFlag.Kind  
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    Main.TerminationException
    This exception signals termination of the compiler.
    UnhandledArgument  
    UsageError
    An exception used to indicate a command-line usage error.
